item.title: Ff Gateway to Adulthood
item.description: +++ title = ‘fRetro Friday: Gateway to Adulthood’ date = ‘2024-08-02T23:59:59-06:00’ draft = true +++ Introduction In an effort to put some guardrails around my hobbies, I have decided to dedicate Friday to working on a retrocomputing project. In this case, I had picked up a Gateway PC of similar build to the one I had in High School.
